"How-- What just...?": "...Heh, honestly."
"If you were going to come save us, you should have done so earlier."
"...Quna."
"...That is not why I'm here. This is simply part of my orders."
"Seriously, they're a bunch of slave-drivers."
"What do you mean, you were all excited to be picked as an ace in the hole."
"Shut up."
"Could the two of you please at least try to get along..."
"Zeno, I'm gonna patch you up!"
"Afin and Yucreta, and even you Echo... Weren't you all on the standby division?"
"...I see. It was to keep our plan from being discovered. So that was your intention, Xiao."
"Hah, that damn brat! Times like these make me really wanna show them what I'm made of!"

"...While that's not in my nature, I agree. Let's show them the power of the
Council of Six. Quna, are you ready?"
"Don't make light of me. I, too, am one of the Six."
"...Manifest! Transparent Blades, Mai."
"Resound! Guiding Blade, Nanaki!"
"Rejoice! Phosphor Engine, Florenberg!"
"...So, what do we do now? Are we heading in there too?"
"Nah, we're gonna trust them and stay here. That way they can rest easy... They'll definitely find a way."
"...You have a lot of faith in them."
"Of course. That's my partner out there, after all."
"Leave this place to us, and win... Partner!"
